article_text: From criticism of Obamacare and Jonathan Gruber, awkward as well as thoughtful comments by politicians to insightful discussion of income inequality, we had a lot to say. The most important quotes for Kansas City and its economy came from Marcelo Claure, the straight-shooting new CEO of Sprint.

The most important quotes for Kansas City and its economy came from Marcelo Claure, the straight-shooting new CEO of Sprint.
From criticism of Obamacare and Jonathan Gruber, awkward as well as thoughtful comments by politicians to insightful discussion of income inequality, we had a lot to say.
